text: Giovanni Mulassano (born 7 July 1985) is an Italian coach a former skeleton racer and bobbsleder who competed at the IBSF World Championships, in 2011 and 2013 at individual senior level in skeleton and in 2016 in four-man bobsleigh. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male bobsledders Category:Italian male skeleton racers Category:Bobsledders of Fiamme Azzurre Category:Skeleton racers of Fiamme Azzurre Category:Italian sports coaches
title: Giovanni Mulassano
